Are you starting on a fresh workspace or an old one?
It was a fresh one using today's WSAD build.

It looks like it was a WSAD build problem.
After edited the following file:
	plugins\org.eclipse.swt_2.0.0\plugin.xml
In that file, change this:
	"../org.eclipse.swt.win32_2.0.0/ws/win32/swt.jar"
to this:
	"$ws$/swt.jar"

It starts up now.
